Package com.intellij.psi

Interface JVMElementFactory

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    PsiElementFactory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GroovyPsiElementFactory, GroovyPsiElementFactoryImpl, PsiElementFactoryImpl

    public interface JVMElementFactory

      Creates a parameter list from the specified parameter names and types.
      PsiPrimitiveType createPrimitiveType(java.lang.String text)
      Returns the primitive type instance for the specified type name, or null if name is not a valid primitive type name.
      PsiSubstitutor createRawSubstitutor(PsiTypeParameterListOwner owner)
      Creates a substitutor for the specified class which replaces all type parameters with their corresponding raw types.
      PsiElement createReferenceElementByType(PsiClassType type)
      Creates a new reference element from the class type.
      PsiSubstitutor createSubstitutor(java.util.Map<PsiTypeParameter,PsiType> map)
      Creates a substitutor which uses the specified mapping between type parameters and types.
      PsiClassType createType(PsiClass aClass)
      Creates a class type for the specified class.

      Creates a class type for the specified class, using the specified substitutor to replace generic type parameters on the class.

      Creates a class type for the specified class, using the specified substitutor and language level to replace generic type parameters on the class.

      PsiClassType createTypeByFQClassName(java.lang.String qName)
      The same as createTypeByFQClassName(String, GlobalSearchScope) with GlobalSearchScope.allScope(com.intellij.openapi.project.Project).
      PsiClassType createTypeByFQClassName(java.lang.String qName, GlobalSearchScope resolveScope)
      Creates a class type referencing a class with the specified class name in the specified search scope.

      Creates new type parameter with the specified name and super types.

      • createType

        PsiClassType createType(PsiClass resolve,
                        PsiSubstitutor substitutor)
        Creates a class type for the specified class, using the specified substitutor to replace generic type parameters on the class.

      • createType

        PsiClassType createType(PsiClass resolve,
                        PsiSubstitutor substitutor,
                        LanguageLevel languageLevel)
        Creates a class type for the specified class, using the specified substitutor and language level to replace generic type parameters on the class.
        Parameters:
        resolve - the class for which the class type is created.
        substitutor - the substitutor to use.
        languageLevel - to memorize language level for allowing/prohibiting boxing/unboxing.
        Returns:
        the class type instance.

      • createType

        PsiClassType createType(PsiClass aClass,
                        PsiType parameters)

      • createType

        PsiClassType createType(PsiClass aClass,
                        PsiType... parameters)

      • createRawSubstitutor

        PsiSubstitutor createRawSubstitutor(PsiTypeParameterListOwner owner)
        Creates a substitutor for the specified class which replaces all type parameters with their corresponding raw types.

      • createSubstitutor

        PsiSubstitutor createSubstitutor(java.util.Map<PsiTypeParameter,PsiType> map)
        Creates a substitutor which uses the specified mapping between type parameters and types.

      • createPrimitiveType

        PsiPrimitiveType createPrimitiveType(java.lang.String text)
        Returns the primitive type instance for the specified type name, or null if name is not a valid primitive type name.
